name: ceilged

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cceil, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: The ceiling of a real number is greater than or equal to that number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
